content: the spofforth sweater is a glorious combination of easy stitches and one piece construction that is a joy to make and wear with a relaxed fit and subtle collar you can be sure to add a statement to whatever you wear it with **what s included** an 11-page pdf including written pattern in both us and uk crochet terms pattern support of you need or would like it difficulty is intermediate **materials and tools ** hook 6mm j crochet hook 1 or size needed to obtain gauge suggested yarn heatherly worsted 2 80% acrylic 20% merino wool 218yds/100g in the color cabana approx yarn required depending on size sizing xs s m l xl 2x 3x 4x 5x gauge 13 sts x 10 5 row = 4 x 4 / 10 cm x 10 cm measured over main set pattern blocked please feel free to send me a message if you have any questions about the pattern as i am more than happy to help you out you are welcome to use this pattern for personal use to make and sell your finished items on a small scale credit to hanjan crochet would be appreciated i d love you to join me at www hanjancrochet com 3 and share my free patterns and tutorials with you - technical information file format this crochet pattern is provided as a digital pdf file only no physical copy of the pattern or finished item will be supplied by purchasing and downloading this pattern you agree to the following below file size under 20mb device/software compatibility compatible with devices supporting pdf readers such as adobe acrobat on smartphones tablets and computers internet requirements an internet connection is needed for downloading the file after purchase usage instructions download the pdf file from the confirmation email or your account s download section - usage instructions complete your purchase on this platform download the pdf file from the confirmation email or your account s download section open the file on any pdf-compatible device and follow the pattern instructions required tools see materials needed - safety and compliance compliance this pattern complies with the general product safety regulation gpsr and other applicable eu directives precautions not suitable for children under 16 without adult supervision ensure your device can open pdf files before purchase disclaimer this product is for educational and personal use only - refund policy this listing is for a digital download pdf pattern not the finished item due to the nature of digital downloads no refunds will be issued please review all product details before purchase disclaimer for use this pattern is provided as is without any guarantees or warranty in connection with the use of the pattern the designer makes no warranties of any kind either express or implied including but not limited to warranties of merchantability non-infringement or fitness for a particular purpose the designer is not liable for any damages including but not limited to direct indirect incidental or consequential damages arising from
